situation.title: Theaters
situation.meta_description: Theatre and other artistic performances are prohibited.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Theatre and other artistic performances are allowed to happen without any audience present. Rehearsals are also allowed. This restriction applies to performances both outdoors and indoors shows.

It is possible to broadcast a play online. 

It is necessary to follow the ban of no singing in a closed space with more than 5 people. The reason being that singing is significantly risky regarding the spread of the virus and there is a high spread of respiratory droplets.

This significantly affects the economic situation of theatres, actors, and other staff. Compensation for the effects of these measures is intended to mitigate this intervention.

See more: Compensation section.
